data.title: Climate & Weather Averages in Leipzig, Saxony, Germany
data.meta_description: Climate data and weather averages in Leipzig
data.text:
Currently: 34 °C. Sunny. (Weather station: Leipzig-Schkeuditz, Germany). See more current weather

Annual Weather Averages Near Leipzig

Averages are for Leipzig-Schkeuditz, which is 14 kilometers from Leipzig.

Based on weather reports collected during 1992–2021.
